page.title: 15Birds Found In Dentdale
page.content: Ornithology is a hobby many folk in Dentdale enjoy perhaps because there are so many interesting birds to be found here. What could be more pleasant than a walk along the river? You would be sure to spot a Dipper bobbing up and down on a rock, if you are lucky you may see a Kingfisher dart,showing a flash of blue,as it dives for a fish,or even a Heron standing like a statue. When walking the fells Peregrine Falcons will be keeping an eye on you from their eyrie as they get ready to hunt for smaller creatures to eat, Buzzards will be on the look out too. Locals delight in seeing Robins, Swallows,Yellowhammers,House Martins, Finches,Wrens Blackbirds,Wagtails and many other birds in their gardens.
